Improved Memory: The ability to remember everything they read would improve memory retention, making it easier for humans to recall information when needed.
Increased Knowledge: Humans would have access to a vast amount of information, leading to increased knowledge and understanding of various subjects.
Better Decision Making: With the ability to remember everything they read, humans would be able to make more informed decisions based on the information they have learned.
Enhanced Creativity: The ability to remember everything they read would provide humans with a wealth of information to draw upon, leading to enhanced creativity and innovation.
Improved Communication: Humans would be able to communicate more effectively, as they would have a wealth of information to draw upon when engaging in conversations.
